definition: Hongxing district of Yichun city 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang
red star/five pointed star as symbol or communism or proletariat/hot film star
Hongxing district of Yichun city 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang

sentences.english: I graduated from junior high school star, I lively and cheerful character, witty humor.
sentences.chinese: 偶畢業於紅星初中，偶噠性格活潑開朗，風趣幽母霈。

sentences.english: The red star flickers, warming our hearts.
Their company stands where Renming Road and Hongxing Road meet.
sentences.chinese: 他們的公司坐落在人民路和紅星路匯合處。

sentences.english: Responses to "Aunty Lucy Not Worthy of a Best Host Nomination?"
sentences.chinese: 安蒂露西不配入圍紅星‘最佳綜藝主持人’？

sentences.english: Beijing is indicated on the map by a red star.
sentences.chinese: 在這幅地圖上北京是用一顆紅星標明的。

sentences.english: On every buses or trams , you can see red stars, like on this picture.
sentences.chinese: 在每輛公汽或火車上，你都能看到照片中的這種紅星。

sentences.english: China grind the red star below the banner is like the cloud, will hold red S.
sentences.chinese: 華研旗下紅星如雲，多年來先後成功捧紅S。

sentences.english: Renowned artiste Mr Stephen CHOW visits the Exhibition Hall.
sentences.chinese: 影視紅星周星馳先生參觀展覽廳。

sentences.english: About MeMy name is Liu Cheng. I am a student of Hongxing Middle School.
sentences.chinese: 你叫劉成，你是紅星中學的一名學生。

sentences.english: Aunty Lucy Not Worthy of a Best Host Nomination?
sentences.chinese: 安蒂露西不配入圍紅星‘最佳綜藝主持人’？

sentences.english: Cherie Chung, one of Hongkong's hottest stars, did a TV commercial for Puma.
sentences.chinese: 香港紅星鐘楚紅替彪馬牌牛仔服做電視廣告。

sentences.english: There was a fire in Red Star School yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天在紅星學校有一場火災。

sentences.english: We're playing against Hongxing Middle School next week.
sentences.chinese: 下週我們要和紅星中學比賽。

sentences.english: After the Star Awards, I went for a vacation with my whole family to Chiangmai.
sentences.chinese: 紅星大獎之後，我就帶全家出國，到泰國的清邁度假。

sentences.english: He thinks Red Star Cinema is the most comfortable movie theater.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲紅星電影院是最舒適的電影院。

sentences.english: The red star shone on his cap.
sentences.chinese: 他軍帽上的紅星閃閃發光。

definition: to fight in one place after another
currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
(sports) member of the national team/national representative/(medicine, chess etc) one of the most highly skilled practitioners in one's country
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
one after another/in succession/one by one/continuously/diverse/in profusion/numerous and confused/pell-mell
